programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Not a Piece of Cake! When the Wonderland cuckoos realize their precious wild strawberry pies have all been picked, it’s mayhem! They go bonkers, screeching up a storm, almost deafening our poor friends. The Queen subsequently orders Alice and Lewis to put an end to this din! But the mission gets tricky when our two heroes find out who picked the pies!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Snow Queen. Alice and Lewis make a "snow-woman" in the Queen’s likeness. But, miffed at not bearing a very strong resemblance to the original, she heads off to meet her model. Our two heroes are scared: their mockery is about to be discovered! But surprise surprise!: the Queen is anything but offended! In fact, she takes the snow-woman under her wing, even going so far as to appoint her her deputy! Unfortunately for Alice and Lewis, this icy substitute becomes just as moody as the Queen: now they’re going to have to do all they can to remind her who she truly is!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Blue Door Mystery. Queen is seething: her QueenMobile has broken down on the other side of Wonderland and she hasn’t found any blue doors to get her back home. So she commissions Alice and Lewis to draw up a map of all the blue doors in the Kingdom. The mission turns out to be more complicated than expected when our heroes realize the doors in question are VERY FIDGETY!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Trainee Book-Wizards. Before heading off on a trip to find new seeds, the Book-Wizard entrusts his garden to his new apprentices, Alice and Lewis. But it’s a pretty stressful experience: besides having to tend to the garden, they also have to answer the Twins when they come to ask for advice, and entertain the Queen when she decides to turn up unannounced, for teatime! And when Charlie gets whisked away by a bird-book, it’s panic-stations for the two apprentices. In fact, things get so out of hand that they have to call the Book-Wizard to the rescue!

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Trying. The bugs talk about trying new things.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Mush-Mush And The Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and the Mushables follows the comedy adventures of the Mushable community as together they put the fun back into fungi! As pocket-sized Guardians of the Forest, each Mushable has a special gift; while Mush-Mush can communicate with nature, Lilit shines bright like the light and Chep has an impressive memory. As they get to know thier talents and their limits, the Mushables find there is still a lot to discover about growing up! A fun journey of self-discovery, exciting outdoor adventure and mush mush more!

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry
programme.desc: Journey into the heart of Singapore with Tom and Jerry as they weave through the labyrinth of towering estates and skyscrapers and bask in the vibrant green of the urban jungle.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Favourite Things. The bugs talk about some of their favourite things.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Jessica's Big Little World
programme.desc: No task is too big, even when you're little! Set to debut in 2023, this preschool spinoff centers on the Creek's favorite resilient little sister, Jessica, as she navigates her way through a world where everything seems much bigger than she is. Although she's the youngest and still needs help with a lot, Jessica is inspired by the grown-ups and bigger kids around her and is persistent in her quest to conquer monumental kid tasks like creating a bedtime routine or saying hi to a new classmate. With the help of her friends, imaginary and real, Jessica sets off to take on the world, even if she still does suck her thumb...sometimes.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Keyboard Capers. Determined to master Beethoven’s symphony, Mr Bean wangles himself a grand piano, a music book, a candelabra and a very patient piano teacher. Liberace, eat your heart out!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A Running Battle. It's the start of a Fun Run. Mr. Bean lines-up beside his deadly enemy: the fat bloke who stole his parking space. Fun Run or no, nothing will stop Bean beating this man to the finishing post, even if he has to flag a cab.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Egg & Bean. Mr. Bean gets in a flap when a monster turns up in his cake-mix. The good news, though, is that the monster turns out to be a harmless baby bird. The bad news is that it grows into a huge stork and takes over his home. Bean attempts to return it to the wild, and finds teaching it to fly makes his arms ache.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Hopping Mad! When the frogspawn in Mr. Bean’s bath hatch out, it’s the last thing his landlady needs, especially when she’s invited the Mayor for tea. Hundreds of angry amphibians decide to invite themselves as well. Bean proves to be no expert at catching slippery green things that won’t stop hopping about all over the blinking place.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.sub-title: Behind the Door. Lucas finds a door at the base of Arlo’s tree – Who does it belong to?
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Broken Key - Part I. In this special two-part episode, Alice finds Wonderland in a very odd state! The Queen is no longer queen: instead, she’s a peasant who grows carrots. And the Twins are now the castle guards, protecting the residence of the King… who happens to be none other than Lewis! But worse still, the rabbit doesn’t even recognize Alice; in fact, he thinks she’s an intruder who must be chased out of the kingdom and whose key must be confiscated! Could Wonderland be becoming a nightmarish kingdom that’s anything but wonderful?!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Broken Key - Part II. In this special two-part episode, Alice finds Wonderland in a very odd state! The Queen is no longer queen: instead, she’s a peasant who grows carrots. But worse still, the rabbit doesn’t even recognize Alice; in fact, he thinks she’s an intruder who must be chased out of the kingdom and whose key must be confiscated! programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Home Away from Home. Tom falls asleep inside a rolled-up carpet left out on the curb by Rick with a "free" sign attached. When the new owners unload their pickup truck and leave the carpet in front of their home, a sleepy Tom doesn't notice at first that everything is similar to, but a little different than, his usual surroundings. Soon Tom feels that he's landed in bizarro world.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: From Riches to Rags. After a series of beatings from Tom, Jerry storms off into his mouse hole. Soon he falls asleep and dreams himself to be the Lord of Downton Abbey! Tom is now servant to Lord Jerry, and the Master wastes no time in making Tom's life miserable. Tom is caught in the act of exacting revenge, so Lord Jerry challenges Tom to a duel in the dream world.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Chew Toy. Tom is watching a hypnotist on TV, when the words "you are asleep" hit him hard. He becomes a virtual rag doll and ends up in a jumble of junk for Rick and Ginger's yard sale. A woman who thinks he's a stuffed animal buys him. Jerry feels bad and hops aboard the car to rescue Tom.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Live and Let Diet. The Lady of the Manor's prize Pomeranian, Alfred, must get some pounds off before the big dog show. The butler suggests exercise—chasing a cat perhaps? Tom happily obliges, as Alfred's successful weight loss guarantees him a cushy spot upstairs. Meanwhile, Jerry aims to sabotage Tom's efforts.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Auntie Social. When Rick and Ginger go to a couple's retreat, they leave Tom with Rick's Auntie Louella. Hearing that she's a whiz in the kitchen, Jerry comes along. The old woman is sweet, but she has a nasty little lap dog that bedevils Tom like crazy. Louella keeps treating Tom poorly, and Tom and Jerry make their plans to escape.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: A Snootful. The Lady of the House's cousins, the Van der Snoots, visit with their prize-winning Persian cat, Prancy Van der Snoot. Tom is warned to make sure that Snooty doesn't catch sight of the pesky manor mice, lest she get upset or dirty her snowy white paws chasing the vermin. Tom is on it, but nothing goes as planned...

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Lame Duck. Ginger and Rick have installed a new birdbath, and Little Quacker has taken up residence in it. Ginger forbids Tom from going out in the back and has Rick move Spike's house. The dog and cat soon unite to return Little Quacker to the pond without Ginger finding out they're responsible for sending him packing.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Taxi Bean. Mr Bean takes a taxi to his local toyshop but a dodgy cabbie thinks he can take Mr Bean for a ride. After a mix up Mr Bean finds himself driving the taxi and starts to have fun couriering people to their destinations even giving an American tourist an extensive tour of London. But will the taxi driver find out what’s been going on and how much will Bean’s final fare be?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Muscle Bean. Mr Bean needs to impress Irma who is infatuated with the hunky deliveryman. Bean tries to improve his physique at the gym but has little success. Instead he opts for an inflatable muscle suit. Irma is indeed impressed and Bean’s plan seems to be working – until the suit gets punctured and Bean makes the mistake of re-inflating it with helium. As Bean floats off into the sky will Irma’s admiration be punctured?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: A New Friend. Mr Bean is initially charmed when a seemingly cute seagull turns up on his windowsill. Bean feeds the gull and invites the bird inside. But it’s not long before the seagull in the flat turns out to be a cuckoo in the nest taking over Bean’s home – eating all his food controlling the TV and sleeping in his bed. Bean starts to regret taking on a new best friend in place of good old reliable Teddy.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: The Lift. Mr Bean sees a new toy car in the window of the local department store Havlotts and decides he must have it. But on the way to the toy department Mr Bean gets stuck in the lift. He tries his best to entertain his fellow passengers but they aren’t very appreciative. How can Mr Bean resolve the situation and get the toy he so desperately wants?

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.sub-title: Arlo's Portrait. Lucas decides to paint a portrait of Arlo. But Arlo can't sit still.
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.sub-title: House Flies Don't Dance. Lucas and Maizie try and help Findley learn how to dance.
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.sub-title: The Insult. When Lucas calls Findley a mean name, he tries to make things right again.
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Life in the Open Air. Dinah invites Alice and Lewis on an adventure with her: “Outdoor life is seriously savage!” Our two friends go along with it, but soon realize it’s just a subterfuge: Dinah is actually running away from her aunt to escape her absurd rules! Uncomfortable being involved in the teen’s flight, Alice and Lewis do everything they can to persuade Dinah to go back to the castle without the Queen even noticing she’s gone. But what if the monarch wasn’t the true reason the girl ran away, after all…?

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Dodson the Adventurer. Alice and Lewis get a surprise when they find out that Dodson is friends with the Queen’s niece, Dinah! They soon discover that this friendship came about after the dodo presented himself to the teen as an “awesome, fearless adventurer!” After Alice accidentally spills the beans, Dinah realizes Dodson lied to her and, subsequently, breaks off their friendship. Noticing how distressed the dodo is by this turn of events, Alice and Lewis help him prove to Dinah that he is, indeed, worthy of his remarkable reputation, with the use of various strategies… and more lies.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Jessica's Big Little World
programme.desc: No task is too big, even when you're little! Set to debut in 2023, this preschool spinoff centers on the Creek's favorite resilient little sister, Jessica, as she navigates her way through a world where everything seems much bigger than she is. Although she's the youngest and still needs help with a lot, Jessica is inspired by the grown-ups and bigger kids around her and is persistent in her quest to conquer monumental kid tasks like creating a bedtime routine or saying hi to a new classmate. With the help of her friends, imaginary and real, Jessica sets off to take on the world, even if she still does suck her thumb...sometimes.

programme.title: Jessica's Big Little World
programme.desc: No task is too big, even when you're little! Set to debut in 2023, this preschool spinoff centers on the Creek's favorite resilient little sister, Jessica, as she navigates her way through a world where everything seems much bigger than she is. With the help of her friends, imaginary and real, Jessica sets off to take on the world, even if she still does suck her thumb...sometimes.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: One of a Kind. Tom and Jerry are hired by Polly the Dog get back her collar from park mean guy Barkley.They help put Barkley in the pound jail. He escapes but loses his memory after getting zapped by an electric fence. He clulessly hires Tom and Jerry to help him track down the detective duo that got him caught in the first place! Barkley reforms when he meets Polly and falls in love with her.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Belly Achin'. When Little Quacker finds that his favorite birdbath is cracked he enlists Jerry’s help to get it fixed. They get sidetracked by the scent of Tom’s delicious chinese takeout. After a battle for the food Tom steals Little Quacker’s fortune cookie and gets the best fortune ever! Tom sets out into the world with his newfound luck only to be on the receiving end of miserable luck.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: One-Way Cricket. Rick blames Tom for letting a cricket into the house. He must get rid of it or he'll be sleeping outside. After Tom nearly destroys the house trying to get rid of the cricket, both the cricket and Tom are thrown outside where the chirping insect soon becomes Spike's problem.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Dog Daze. It's the hottest day ever and Spike is building a swimming pool for his son Tyke. When Tom and Jerry get kicked out of the house for being too destructive Spike enlists their help. Spike must do everything he can from losing his temper in front of Tyke when Tom and Jerry fail to do things the right way.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Heel! What a disaster!: the Queen’s favorite booties have gone missing! And if Alice and Lewis don’t find them, they’re going to have to shine all fifty-thirteen other pairs of shoes in her majesty’s possession! Hot on the heels of the mischievous boots, our two heroes must use clever tactics to persuade them to get back to the Queen’s feet!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Too Young. When Alice and Lewis go to the Valley of the Night to look for MooMoo wool, they run into Queen and Charlie. When the little prince asks if he can go with the girl and her rabbit friend, the Queen begrudgingly agrees, and orders the two friends to take good care of her nephew. Charlie is ecstatic to be able to go on a “big boy’s adventure!” But is brought down to Earth with a bang when he finds out his aunt has been following them on the quiet. Feeling betrayed, he decides to run away.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Frost Ball. The King of Frostaland invites the Queen to a “frost ball” in his realm. Eager to look good, the Wonderland monarch appoints Lewis to open the ball, and threatens to remove him as clockmaster should he mess up! The poor rabbit must now set about learning the art of “tea-skating,” a kind of ice-skating on teapots! Only problem is, he’s scared of taking the plunge and decides to listen to Dodson’s advice (the dodo’s taken on the role of self-appointed coach) instead of simply trying it out himself. Needless to say, Dodson exploits the situation to get extra special treatment. So Alice steps in, determined to do whatever it takes to bring Lewis to his senses.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Sleeping King. When the Queen reluctantly takes Charlie to Frostaland so he can take part in the traditional “Cherry-Choc Harvest,” she finds the King fast asleep, due to a blunder committed by Alice. But instead of helping Alice and Lewis find an antidote to break the magic spell he’s under, the monarch throws every monkey wrench she can possibly get her hands on into the works! Truth is: she’s jealous of Charlie’s affection for the King of Frostaland.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Things We Love. The bugs talk about what they love.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Mush-Mush And The Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and the Mushables follows the comedy adventures of the Mushable community as together they put the fun back into fungi! As pocket-sized Guardians of the Forest, each Mushable has a special gift; while Mush-Mush can communicate with nature, Lilit shines bright like the light and Chep has an impressive memory. As they get to know thier talents and their limits, the Mushables find there is still a lot to discover about growing up! A fun journey of self-discovery, exciting outdoor adventure and mush mush more!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry
programme.desc: Journey into the heart of Singapore with Tom and Jerry as they weave through the labyrinth of towering estates and skyscrapers and bask in the vibrant green of the urban jungle.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: In The Doghouse. Mike is forced to spend the day outside in his doghouse due to Grandma Mikkelsen's fur allergy. Mike makes the best of being exiled and plans to spruce the place up and invite Iris over for an outdoor picnic. But Mercury has been kicked out of his lair after a fight with his brother and decides to squat in the doghouse. Mike does everything he can to wake up the snoozing raccoon and get him out of his home. It looks like he's going to have to bring in the big guns if has any chance of evicting his unwanted guest before Iris shows up.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Spike Gets Skooled. Tom gets Spike sent to obedience school and Jerry is left without a protector. When Spike returns Tom tries hard to get Spike to revert to his old ways. Jerry fights back to make sure that Spike keeps his cool.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Cat's Ruffled Fur-niture. Tom is under strict orders to not wake the Witch sisters but Jerry is set on getting Tom in trouble. When Tom uses the magic spell wand and makes all of the furniture come alive he must get the help of Newt to make everything go back as it was.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Restaurant. Mr. Bean’s Birthday dinner gets off on the wrong foot when he and Teddy are made to take the worst table at a swanky restaurant. The evening is further ruined by a self-obsessed movie star at the next table. After a swim in the lobster tank, Mr. Bean unwittingly cooks up sweet revenge in the kitchen.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Art thief. During a visit to London's National Gallery, Bean witnesses the theft of a major work of art. Bloodhound that he is, he pursues the culprit across the Channel to Paris only to be waylaid by a Reliant Robin, a traffic jam, and a mime artist under the Eiffel Tower. Will Mr Bean ‘the International Art Sleuth’ prove successful?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Scaredy Bean. Who's afraid of daft films about giant killer cats, blobs from outer space and thumb-size men who dance around in sugar bowls? Mr. Bean is. He's very afraid. A trip to the cinema makes Mr. Bean’s imagination play tricks on him.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Hot Date. Against his better judgement, Bean has agreed to go out on a proper date with Irma Gobb, his girlfriend. She has the perfect evening planned: a romantic film followed by a candlelit dinner for two. If only she had the perfect boyfriend to go with it.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.sub-title: Mock Me Not. Lucas playfully mimics Bodhi. But he may have offended her.
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.sub-title: Jumping Pal. Lucas encounters a peculiar creature - A Jumping Bean.
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider

This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Life's Not A Breeze! While feeding the Cutie-Twees, Twee Dum accidentally swallows some “ballooney berries.” As a result, he floats skyward, giving the Breeze-Twee an opportunity to escape! While Lewis gets busy gathering the ingredients for Twee Dum’s antidote, Alice offers to head off with Twee Di to fetch back the escaped Cutie-Twee.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Super-Cutie-Twee. When Alice arrives in Wonderland, she finds Lewis and the Twins captivated by a Cutie-Twee with puppy dog eyes. Wise to its tricks, realizing it’s using its charms to get pampered, Alice goes out of her way to get her friends to see through the Cutie-Twee’s little game. But then the Queen comes along and snatches away the adorable little critter, adopting it as her own personal pet, locked away in the castle!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes
programme.sub-title: Time Out! Bugs Daffy and Taz are disciplined by having a time out in the corner.
programme.desc: Baby Looney Tunes introduces the world's most beloved cartoon characters as precocious preschoolers, discovering the world one baby-step at a time!

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes
programme.sub-title: Present Tense
programme.desc: Baby Looney Tunes introduces the world's most beloved cartoon characters as precocious preschoolers, discovering the world one baby-step at a time!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: School of Hard Knocks. Like a big brother, Jerry gets a sleepy Tuffy out of bed, makes them both breakfast, gets Tuffy cleaned up, puts on his backpack and scoots him past the mean ol' cat to the house next door where WINSTON waits, greeting his students, a gaggle of mice, including Jerry. They each hand their kindly teacher a treat as they take their seats on little spools of thread, ready for the start of class. Winston is teaching his students the basics of force and motion, and today they're going on a field trip to see physics in action. They end up at Tom's house where Tom bears the brunt of the school load until he gets a little tutoring himself.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Brain Food. Waffles is worried that his roommate Bo had his brain eaten by aliens, leaving him a zombie dog. Turns out he's not the first dog in his neighborhood to wake up stupid. Afraid of becoming the next Bo, Waffles hires the Cat and Mouse Detectives to put a stop to this alien invasion. Our Narrator thinks all of this extraterrestrial talk is a load of sci-fi hooey but not our detectives; they're covering all their bases and taking every necessary precaution. Turns out the dog's behavior has more to do with a tainted bag of kibble than visitors from another planet… or does it?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Cold Snap. Wanting to cool off from the blistering heat, Tom and Jerry use a little magic to make it snow, turning the witches' world into a haunted winter wonderland with an evil snowman, haunted snow forts and magic snowball fights. Now they have to figure out how to make it stop snowing.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: The Tortoise Don't Play Fair. When a Hare loses to a Tortoise in the biggest race of the year, he comes to Tom and Jerry claiming foul play. It's up to the duo to see what's really behind the most famous race in history.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Wish Bone. Butch finds a wish bone in the garbage and dupes Tom into believing that it will make his wishes come true. Butch trades Tom the bone for a dozen cans of cat food. The alley cat thinks he's pulled off the best scam ever UNTIL Tom's wishes start coming true (from Jerry getting his just dessert to Toodles paying an unexpected visit)! Now Butch will stop at nothing to get that bone back!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Novel Idea. An overflowing trash bin filled with crumpled paper can mean only one thing…Tom is writing a novel - it's a mystery novel, of course! Tom soon realizes his book is playing out in real life (including the femme fatale who has taken an interest in the feline Mikey Spillane). At first, Tom has fun crafting his own fate, but soon realizes no matter how hard he tries to rewrite his story, he gets deeper and deeper into trouble. Jerry begins to suspect the alley cat, Butch, is up to no good – in the end, Jerry figures out Butch was retrieving Tom's discarded writing from the trash and using it to his advantage!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Cat Match Fever. Butch is bobbing for apple cores when he spots a dolled up Toodles heading his way! Butch slicks back his hair with some lard and strikes a pose. But she walks right past the alley cat. Meanwhile, inside the house, Tom spots Toodles headed in his direction. After a quick spruce up, Tom opens the door only to watch her walk right past the house. Tom slumps. Turns out Toodles is headed to Winston's house. Yep, who knew the two were a match made in kitty heaven (or at least that's what the catmatch app said). Tom and Butch both set out to win Toodles affection while Jerry plays Cyrano to Winston to help him get over his nerves.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Lord Bean. Mr Bean is in the library studying his family heritage. Someone brings to his attention Mr Bean’s resemblance to a certain Lord Bean. Mr Bean sets off to track down his ancestral home (a castle) in Scotland where he is welcomed with open arms. But owning a castle is not cheap. Can Mr Bean escape before he runs out of money and has there been a case of mistaken identity?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Car Wars. Mr Bean and his beloved car find themselves in a crash for crash battle with his arch nemesis the Reliant Robin. It’s a contest to find out who can hold their nerve the longest. Does Mr Bean win? Is his car left unscathed? And more importantly do we find out who the driver of the Reliant Robin really is?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Wedding Day. Mr Bean has got everything ready for Irma’s birthday; card cake candles but he just needs to get her some flowers. But nothing goes to plan as Mr Bean inadvertently causes a car crash involving a bride on her wedding day. There’s no time to lose as Mr Bean promises he’ll get the bride to the church on time. Irma is not a happy lady as Mr Bean is distracted by the task in hand.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Bean Phone. Mr Bean is keen to own a brand new smart phone when he discovers all the wonderful things it can do. But after a trip to the mobile phone shop he is horrified at how much they cost and decides to build his own one. Bean’s phone may be bulky but it comes with a whole range of built in gadgets especially useful during a race to The Tower of London.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.sub-title: Boot Castle. Findley discovers a boot that him and Lucas use as a castle.
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Surprise Guests - Part I. Bastien and Carole make friends with a new student at school, inviting them to play with them every time. Alice is worried she’ll lose her place in the group because of it. Unsettled, she rushes to Wonderland to see Lewis. But when she gets there, she finds Bastien and Carole are there too! Alice loves the idea at first, but soon changes her mind when she sees how well her two schoolfriends are getting on with Lewis! How is this even possible?! Then, Alice finds out there’s a huge danger looming over Wonderland (could it have something to do with Bastien and Carole’s presence here?!). What if their being here causes Wonderland to vanish?! Or what if this is just one big nightmare?...

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Surprise Guests - Part II. Bastien and Carole make friends with a new student at school, inviting them to play with them every time. Alice is worried she’ll lose her place in the group because of it. Unsettled, she rushes to Wonderland to see Lewis. But when she gets there, she finds Bastien and Carole are there too! However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Jessica's Big Little World
programme.desc: No task is too big, even when you're little! Set to debut in 2023, this preschool spinoff centers on the Creek's favorite resilient little sister, Jessica, as she navigates her way through a world where everything seems much bigger than she is. Although she's the youngest and still needs help with a lot, Jessica is inspired by the grown-ups and bigger kids around her and is persistent in her quest to conquer monumental kid tasks like creating a bedtime routine or saying hi to a new classmate. With the help of her friends, imaginary and real, Jessica sets off to take on the world, even if she still does suck her thumb...sometimes.

programme.title: Jessica's Big Little World

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Cat's Ruffled Fur-niture. Tom is under strict orders to not wake the Witch sisters but Jerry is set on getting Tom in trouble. When Tom uses the magic spell wand and makes all of the furniture come alive he must get the help of Newt to make everything go back as it was.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Sleep Disorder. Rick buys Ginger a brand new mattress with a lot of high tech features. Tom is under strict orders to never sleep on it but Butch convinces him to try it out. Jerry uses the controls against them and soon that mattress is out of control and destroys the entire house.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom's In-Tents Adventure. Tom and Jerry get a taste of the great outdoors on their camping trip to Yosemite. Tom tries hard to get some relaxation but nature and all its inhabitants including bears get in his way.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Batwheels

Alice loves the idea at first, but soon changes her mind when she sees how well her two schoolfriends are getting on with Lewis! How is this even possible?! Then, Alice finds out there’s a huge danger looming over Wonderland (could it have something to do with Bastien and Carole’s presence here?!). What if their being here causes Wonderland to vanish?! Or what if this is just one big nightmare?...

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Surprise Guests - Part II. Bastien and Carole make friends with a new student at school, inviting them to play with them every time. Alice is worried she’ll lose her place in the group because of it. Unsettled, she rushes to Wonderland to see Lewis. But when she gets there, she finds Bastien and Carole are there too! Alice loves the idea at first, but soon changes her mind when she sees how well her two schoolfriends are getting on with Lewis! How is this even possible?! Then, Alice finds out there’s a huge danger looming over Wonderland (could it have something to do with Bastien and Carole’s presence here?!). What if their being here causes Wonderland to vanish?! Or what if this is just one big nightmare?...

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Birthday Party. Mr Bean is feeling very left out when he discovers that Mrs Wicket is having a huge party downstairs and apparently he isn’t invited. Bean tries every trick in the book to sneak himself into the party – even resorting to hiding inside an enormous cake. If only he knew the real reason for the celebration.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: In The Garden. Mr Bean’s attempt to cut the grass is thwarted by a pesky root which refuses to budge. When Mr Bean breaks his spade he heads to the local Garden Centre to find a replacement. But instead of simply buying one he enters a gardening competition to win one - judged by none other than the Queen herself! Its gardening gloves off when Mr Bean goes into battle with his rival green-fingered competitors.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: A Magic Day Out. Mr Bean and Irma are off for a day at the seaside. Irma is travelling light but Bean wants to take almost everything his owns in an enormous trunk. Arriving at the seaside Bean’s trunk gets accidentally swapped with a trunk belonging to a famous stage magician. As Bean entertains Irma pulling rabbits out of hats the angry magician arrives on the scene - and he’s not a happy bunny.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Ball Pool. Mr Bean loves playing in the neighbourhood soft play centre – bouncing on the trampolines whizzing down the slides and most of all immersing himself in the ball pool. But he doesn’t like sharing the place with all those annoying kids. So Bean decides to turn his flat into his own private play area where he can play in peace. Unfortunately Irma Mrs Wicket and The Bruisers all want to join in the fun with him.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Tooth the Rescue! When one of Lewis’ teeth falls out, no little tooth fairy comes to see him. Instead, the whole of Wonderland converges upon him! Basically, in this world, a loose tooth is an opportunity for making a wish, which makes it a very sought-after commodity among the Wonderlanders!! In the midst of all this squabbling, Alice must use cunning to help her good friend Lewis hold onto his precious tooth!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Journey to the Moon. While delivering a yummy stew to the Queen, Alice and Lewis notice the moon is crying and that its falling tears are flooding the castle! Afraid her royal residence is about to collapse any minute, Queen orders Alice and Lewis to find a solution to this problem on the double! And so off they go to the moon, where a whole plethora of surprises awaits them.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Seam Stress. Today, Queen has decided to commission a unique dress from her talented Seamstress Card: she wants it made out of wild thread – a very difficult one to tame! And should her Seamstress Card fail to pull it off, she will be relieved of her duties on the spot! Alice and Lewis jump to it, coming up with all kinds of bright ideas to help out the poor card. As a result, in the end, a whole cat walk of dresses awaits the Queen!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Freeze-All Cutie-Twee. Alice and Lewis find the twins frozen in place! It turns out to be the doing of a young Freeze-All Cutie-Twee who has become friends with Charlie. In fact, these two besties are having the time of their lives, traveling all over the place, freezing the whole Kingdom, unaware that the young Cutie-Twee has not yet mastered its powers! Alice and Lewis must find a way to persuade Charlie to take the Cutie-Twee back to its peers.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Waiting. The bugs talk about waiting for things they really want.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Mush-Mush And The Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and the Mushables follows the comedy adventures of the Mushable community as together they put the fun back into fungi! As pocket-sized Guardians of the Forest, each Mushable has a special gift; while Mush-Mush can communicate with nature, Lilit shines bright like the light and Chep has an impressive memory. As they get to know thier talents and their limits, the Mushables find there is still a lot to discover about growing up! A fun journey of self-discovery, exciting outdoor adventure and mush mush more!

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.sub-title: Hide N' Seek. The crew plays Hide N’ Seek at headquarters and Tweety is the seeker.
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Advantage Hana Mandlíková
programme.desc: 2/2. Přestože se ve své době střetávala s téměř nepřemožitelnými legendami Martinou Navrátilovou a Chris Evertovou, dokázala získat čtyři grandslamové tituly. Hana Mandlíková uspěla rovněž jako trenérka Jany Novotné a do špičkového tenisu dovedla svá dvojčata Marka a Elizabeth. V zábavném rozhovoru natočeném na floridské pláži vzpomíná na všechna svá bydliště v různých koutech planety či rozebírá rozporuplnou současnost světového tenisu.
